flawed_nl_solution:
The rancher would have sold his cattle for $204000/340 = $<<204000/340=6000>>6000 per head.
He was left with a remainder of 340 - 172 = <<340-172=168>>168 head of cattle.
The lowered price is $6000 - $150 = $<<6000-150=5850>>5850 per head.
He would make $5850 x 168 = $<<5850*168=982800>>982800 at the lowered price.
He could have made $6000 x 168 = $<<6000*168=1008000>>1008000 at the original price.
He would lose $1008000 - $982800 = $<<1008000-982800=25200>>25200
#### 25200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600, not 6000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
